response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This innovative solution has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards in its field, offering unparalleled performance and efficiency. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and features, we're offering this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $15,000. This special offer is tailored to recognize your potential as a valuable client and to ensure you have the chance to experience the benefits of our product firsthand. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 15000}
